column4: Hi there just trying to make a crontab and i pressed 1 now all i get is 888
anyone know how to wipe it out and start again i wanted to select 2
but before I had an option of 1-4
when you type whereis crontab does it show one in /usr/bin ?
what editor did you pick when it asked?
try opening another terminal as the normal user and see if it is working with crontab -l
you should have crontab for any uer
